alert.note: Alert for St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Avoyelles and north central St. Landry Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 308 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goudeau, or near Morrow, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moreauville, Morrow, Cottonport, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Big Cane, Goudeau, Dupont and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
